review: I love it.  No problems at all !!!!!
author: Reshon

review: Had a few issues getting it started on one tv.
author: Rann

review: Am very pleased with the Amazon Fire Stick.  Tried the Roku, extremely difficult to get set up.
author: Skequen

review: Was very easy to set up and easy to use. The power cable is a little short, but it works just fine.
author: Rosie

review: Very inexpensive way to get Netflix, Amazon Prime and Plex all on one box.  With wireless being the only network option, I have seen some latency issues with all three services, but nothing bad enough to warrant returning it.  With Plex, I have actually had shows stop and go back the show menu.  In hindsight, I would probably spend the extra money for the Fire TV as it has an Ethernet port, more RAM and a faster processor.
author: Rob & Jenni Davis

review: I am very disappointed in the wireless performance. The unit will not allow HD playback without losing connection, however a Roku XD plugged into the same port on the same TV in the same exact spot  works flawlessly. I bought the Firestick to replace an older BluRay because it was cheaper than adding another Roku. Got what I paid for. After a week of frustration went and purchased another Roku.
author: Patrick Shaw

review: Was very happy with it. Very easy to install
author: Jana bryant
